::Aerotaur::
    On his way back to the base he picked up the transmission from Red Bolt.  
By the time he gets there Aerotaur sees Freewing taking off and heading for 
their base.  At the base he lands and returns to his bot mode.  There he sees 
Nightlight and Perplex fighting with two unknown bots and a third unknown bot 
helping them, sort of.  He looks between them and decides that Perplex is 
fine.  He turns and leaps at Clash drawing his staff and slashing at his 
back.
